item.text: Jacob heard that Laban’s sons were complaining, “Jacob has taken everything that belonged to our father! He has gotten rich at our father’s expense!”
When Jacob saw the look on Laban’s face, he could tell his attitude toward him had changed.
The Lord said to Jacob, “Return to the land of your fathers and to your relatives. I will be with you.”

So <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> a <st data-num="07121" class="">message</st> for <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> and <st data-num="03812" class="">Leah</st><n id="1" /> to come to the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">where</st> his <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st> were.<n id="3" />

There he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">can tell</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">attitude</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> me has <st data-num="0369 08543 08032">changed</st>,<n id="1" /> but the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of my <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> has <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="05978" class="">with</st> me.

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> I’ve <st data-num="05647" class="">worked for</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">as hard</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">as I could</st>,<n id="1" />

but your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> has <st data-num="02048" class="">humiliated</st><n id="1" /> me and <st data-num="02498" class="">changed</st> my <st data-num="04909" class="">wages</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> <st data-num="04489" class="">times</st>. But <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">permitted</st> him to <st data-num="07489 05978">do</st> me any <st data-num="07489 05978">harm</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="03541 0559">said</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘The <st data-num="05348" class="">speckled animals</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="07939" class="">wage</st>,’ then the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">gave birth to</st> <st data-num="05348" class="">speckled offspring</st>. But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> he <st data-num="03541 0559">said</st>, ‘The <st data-num="06124" class="">streaked animals</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="07939" class="">wage</st>,’ then the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">gave birth to</st> <st data-num="06124" class="">streaked offspring</st>.
In this way God has snatched away your father’s livestock and given them to me.
“Once during breeding season I saw in a dream that the male goats mating with the flock were streaked, speckled, and spotted.

In the <st data-num="02472" class="">dream</st> the <st data-num="04397" class="">angel</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, ‘<st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>!’ ‘<st data-num="02009" class="">Here</st> I am!’ I <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>.

Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="05375 04994 05869 07200">Observe that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06260" class="">male goats</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">mating</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st> are <st data-num="06124" class="">streaked</st>, <st data-num="05348" class="">speckled</st>, or <st data-num="01261" class="">spotted</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="07200" class="">observed</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> has <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to you.
I am the God of Bethel, where you anointed the sacred stone and made a vow to me. Now leave this land immediately and return to your native land.’”
Then Rachel and Leah replied to him, “Do we still have any portion or inheritance in our father’s house?

<st data-num="03808" class="">Hasn’t</st> he <st data-num="02803" class="">treated</st> us <st data-num="02803" class="">like</st> <st data-num="05237" class="">foreigners</st>? He <st data-num="03588" class="">not only</st> <st data-num="04376" class="">sold</st> us, <st data-num="01571" class="">but</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">completely</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">wasted</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> paid for us!<n id="2" />
Surely all the wealth that God snatched away from our father belongs to us and to our children. So now do everything God has told you.”
So Jacob immediately put his children and his wives on the camels.
He took away all the livestock he had acquired in Paddan Aram and all his moveable property that he had accumulated. Then he set out toward the land of Canaan to return to his father Isaac.
While Laban had gone to shear his sheep, Rachel stole the household idols that belonged to her father.

<st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> also <st data-num="01589 03820">deceived</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> the <st data-num="0761" class="">Aramean</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> <st data-num="01097" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">telling</st> him <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="01272" class="">leaving</st>.<n id="2" />
He left with all he owned. He quickly crossed the Euphrates River and headed for the hill country of Gilead.
Three days later Laban discovered Jacob had left.

So he <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him and <st data-num="07291 0310">pursued</st> Jacob<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01870">for</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="01692" class="">caught up with</st><n id="4" /> him in the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st>.
But God came to Laban the Aramean in a dream at night and warned him, “Be careful that you neither bless nor curse Jacob.”
Laban overtook Jacob, and when Jacob pitched his tent in the hill country of Gilead, Laban and his relatives set up camp there too.

“<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> have you <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st>?” <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">demanded</st> of <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>. “You’ve <st data-num="01589 03824">deceived</st> me<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05090" class="">carried away</st> my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> as if they were <st data-num="07617" class="">captives</st> of <st data-num="02719" class="">war</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> did you <st data-num="01272" class="">run away</st> <st data-num="02244" class="">secretly</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01589" class="">deceive</st> me?<n id="2" /> Why <st data-num="03808" class="">didn’t</st> you <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st> me so I could <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> you <st data-num="07971" class="">off</st> with a <st data-num="08057" class="">celebration</st> complete with <st data-num="07892" class="">singing</st>, <st data-num="08596" class="">tambourines</st>, and <st data-num="03658" class="">harps</st>?<n id="3" />

You <st data-num="03808" class="">didn’t</st> even <st data-num="05203" class="">allow</st> me to <st data-num="05401" class="">kiss</st> my <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> and my <st data-num="01121" class="">grandchildren</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05401" class="">goodbye</st>. You have <st data-num="06258 06213">acted</st> <st data-num="05528" class="">foolishly</st>!

I <st data-num="03426" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="0410 03027">power</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="06213 05973">do</st> you <st data-num="07451" class="">harm</st>, but the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0559 0413 0559">told</st> me <st data-num="0570" class="">last night</st>, ‘<st data-num="08104" class="">Be careful</st><n id="2" /> that you <st data-num="01696" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">bless</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">curse</st> <st data-num="05973 03290">Jacob</st>.’<n id="3" />
Now I understand that you have gone away because you longed desperately for your father’s house. Yet why did you steal my gods?”
“I left secretly because I was afraid!” Jacob replied to Laban. “I thought you might take your daughters away from me by force.
Whoever has taken your gods will be put to death! In the presence of our relatives identify whatever is yours and take it.” (Now Jacob did not know that Rachel had stolen them.)
So Laban entered Jacob’s tent, and Leah’s tent, and the tent of the two female servants, but he did not find the idols. Then he left Leah’s tent and entered Rachel’s.

(Now <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> had <st data-num="03947" class="">taken</st> the <st data-num="08655" class="">idols</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> them inside her <st data-num="01581" class="">camel’s</st> <st data-num="03733" class="">saddle</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03427" class="">sat</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> them.)<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="04959" class="">searched</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st>, but did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> them.<n id="3" />
Rachel said to her father, “Don’t be angry, my lord. I cannot stand up in your presence because I am having my period.” So he searched thoroughly, but did not find the idols.
Jacob became angry and argued with Laban. “What did I do wrong?” he demanded of Laban. “What sin of mine prompted you to chase after me in hot pursuit?
When you searched through all my goods, did you find anything that belonged to you? Set it here before my relatives and yours, and let them settle the dispute between the two of us!
“I have been with you for the past 20 years. Your ewes and female goats have not miscarried, nor have I eaten rams from your flocks.

<st data-num="02966" class="">Animals torn by wild beasts</st> I <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you; <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> always <st data-num="02398" class="">absorbed the loss</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">myself</st>.<n id="1" /> You always <st data-num="01245" class="">made</st> me <st data-num="01245" class="">pay</st> for every missing animal,<n id="2" /> whether it was <st data-num="01589" class="">taken</st> by <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="01589" class="">or</st> at <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>.

I <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">consumed</st> by <st data-num="02721" class="">scorching heat</st><n id="1" /> during the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> and by <st data-num="07140" class="">piercing cold</st><n id="2" /> at <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>, and <st data-num="05869" class="">I</st> <st data-num="05074" class="">went without</st> <st data-num="08142" class="">sleep</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> was my lot<n id="1" /> for <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> in your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>: I <st data-num="05647" class="">worked like a slave</st><n id="2" /> for you—<st data-num="0702 06240">14</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> for your <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> and <st data-num="08337" class="">6</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> for your <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st>—but you <st data-num="02498" class="">changed</st> my <st data-num="04909" class="">wages</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">10</st> <st data-num="04489" class="">times</st>!

If the God of my father—the God of Abraham, the one whom Isaac fears—had not been with me, you would certainly have sent me away empty-handed! But God saw how I was oppressed and how hard I worked, and he rebuked you last night.”

Laban replied to Jacob, “These women are my daughters, these children are my grandchildren, and these flocks are my flocks. All that you see belongs to me. But how can I harm these daughters of mine today or the children to whom they have given birth?
So now, come, let’s make a formal agreement, you and I, and it will be proof that we have made peace.”
So Jacob took a stone and set it up as a memorial pillar.

Then <st data-num="03290" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to his <st data-num="0251" class="">relatives</st>, “<st data-num="03950" class="">Gather</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>.” So they <st data-num="03947" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="06213" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="01530" class="">pile</st>.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="01530">pile of stones</st>.
Laban called it Jegar Sahadutha, but Jacob called it Galeed.
Laban said, “This pile of stones is a witness of our agreement today.” That is why it was called Galeed.
It was also called Mizpah because he said, “May the Lord watch between us when we are out of sight of one another.
If you mistreat my daughters or if you take wives besides my daughters, although no one else is with us, realize that God is witness to your actions.”
“Here is this pile of stones and this pillar I have set up between me and you,” Laban said to Jacob.

“<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> <st data-num="01530" class="">pile of stones</st> and the <st data-num="04676" class="">pillar</st> are <st data-num="05707 05713">reminders</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">pass beyond</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01530" class="">pile</st> to come <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> harm you and <st data-num="0518" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">pass beyond</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01530" class="">pile</st> and <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04676" class="">pillar</st> to come <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">harm</st> me.<n id="1" />

May the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st> and the <st data-num="0430" class="">god</st> of <st data-num="05152" class="">Nahor</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> of their <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> us.” <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="07650" class="">took an oath</st> by the God whom his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="06343" class="">feared</st>.<n id="2" />
Then Jacob offered a sacrifice on the mountain and invited his relatives to eat the meal. They ate the meal and spent the night on the mountain.
(32:1) Early in the morning Laban kissed his grandchildren and his daughters goodbye and blessed them. Then Laban left and returned home.
